bibl.title: Two Instances of the Satrap Stela: Tokens of the Graeco-Egyptian Linguistic and Cultural Interrelation at the Start of the Hellenism?
Moving Across Borders. Foreign Relations, Religion and Cultural Interactions in the Ancient Mediterranean
bibl.author: LADYNIN, Ivan A.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Ḫšryš3 — "Xerxes" — "Artaxerxes". - "The boundary of 'Ir-mr-3 / Mr-mr-3" and its "army". - Final Remarks.
bibl.seg: LADYNIN Ivan A., Two Instances of the Satrap Stela: Tokens of the Graeco-Egyptian Linguistic and Cultural Interrelation at the Start of the Hellenism?

Panagiotis KOUSOULIS and Konstantinos MAGLIVERAS (Edd.), Moving Across Borders. Foreign Relations, Religion and Cultural Interactions in the Ancient Mediterranean = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 159 (Leuven - Paris - Dudley, Mass., 2007) pp. 317-326, figg. 35-41.
